title: Reviews
text:
Reviews
Did you ever wonder what other people say about our services? No more, check out some reviews below! More are visible in our #service-review channel on our discord server.






Temple of Febe Legendary CM, 27.05.2024



Thank you for the smooth Febe LCM kill. The whole group was super nice and explained the whole process. Would definitely recommend to others!








Temple of Febe Legendary CM, 07.05.2024



Super smooth and friendly! I told the team that I would keep them in touch for future contents as well (I did Febe Legendary challenge mode). Super happy with the service. Thank you guys once again, yall amazing! EDIT: forgot to mention that i come from US server and they made it super easy to transfer to EU server, basically guided me thru the whole process. thank you again guys!








Harvest Temple CM - Voidwalker & Kaineng Overlook CM, 09.04.2024



Thanks for the run (HT and KO), all went perfectly (and it’s always a pleasure to look at players so much better than me play hard content !) Now I need to save for Cerus !








Harvest Temple CM - Voidwalker, 26.01.2024



Extremely fast delivery with HTCM, smooth run. I highly recommend the team 🙂








Old Lions Court CM - Title Achievement, 27.12.2023



Great Old Lion Arch title run this evening! Smooth and clean 🙂 Thanks again!








Harvest Temple CM - Voidwalker, 22.09.2023



I know my stuff. These guys know it more. Legitimately the best 10 man execution I’ve ever seen. Bonus points for the memes, too. A+








Harvest Temple CM - All Achievements, 03.06.2023



Thanks for the all achievements HT CM. It was divine. Better call UNIT for service!








Harvest Temple CM - All Achievements, 13.05.2023



Thanks so much for the HTCM (Voidwalker+Standing Together) clear! Very fast and smooth, thank you for all the detailed explanations as well as for being so responsive!








Harvest Temple CM - Voidwalker, 14.04.2023



Hey guys! Tyvm for the HTCM. You are realy cool guys! It was fun and I’m really happy about it! It was worth every coin! 🙂








Harvest Temple CM - All Achievements, 02.04.2023



Hey i bought the HTCM with all Achievements, good service fast run!. Thank you again ^^

title: Who are we?
text:
Who are we?
We are dedicated players of the guild [UNIT] who love playing hard content. Across our team, we have multiple thousands of succesful Harvest Temple CM kills and (already) hundreds of Temple of Febe CM kills. We like to push ourselves to the limit and enjoy playing that content. Naturally, we expanded and started to offer services for strikes.


What services can you get from us?
We mostly focus on Strikes Challenge Modes, since that’s what we enjoy most. Furthermore, we enjoy and fill a niche especially around the hardest strikes and associated achievements in the game: Harvest Temple and Temple of Febe. We also offer services for other strike CMs, in particular also infusion unlock services (e.g. Everbloom Infusion - EoD Strike CMs). Check out our prices here.

title: FAQ
text:
FAQ






1. What services do you provide?





We provide any achievements related to Strike Missions, including everything from only Challenge Mode kills to individual achievements.









2. At what days/times are you running?





Usually we run Thursday to Sunday at varying times between 19:30 and 23:30 CET/CEST. Exceptions are possible if those hours don’t work, simply ask in #🚀request-service, or via DM.









3. How is payment handled?





Payment is done upfront when the run starts. If multiple services are booked across different days, payment can be split per service for any given day. The only exception is if a service is booked a few days in advance; in that case we ask for a 5% deposit. We accept payment mostly in Mystic Coins and Antique Summoning Stones, but other types of payment can also be discussed. Just ask us!









4. Do I need to do anything during the sell session?





Depends on the service. Some achievements and clears without achievement require no action. In those cases you can simply /gg once the combat starts. But there are a few achievement that require you to participate in some way. This depends on the specific achievement in question. A detailed explanation for all services is given in #📝instructions and will also be explained briefly before the service starts.









5. On what servers are you providing these services?





Services are provided on European servers only. However, depending on the regional pricing from other groups, it might be cheaper if you transfer to EU, buy our service and then transfer back to your region. If you are interested in transfering, check out more details in #📝instructions, or ask us via #🚀request-service.









6. How do I request a service?





You can go to #🚀request-service (a channel on our Discord server) and open a Ticket. We will then come back to answer any question, or handle scheduling as soon as possible.



More Questions? Simply ask us on Discord! ❤️

title: Pricing
text:
👹 CM: 750 MC  👹 Possession Infusion unlock: 750 MC (unlocked by killing CM)  👹 Legendary CM: 3.000 MC  👹 Apathetic/Embodiment of Sin: not yet available



🐉 Voidwalker: 500 MC  🐉 All achievs: 800 MC



🌸 All CMs: 1.100 MC  🌸 Without HT CM: 720 MC



    Kill: 300 MC      Title achievement: 500 MC      All achievements: 700 MC
For any other specific achievement request, please contact with us!
We are open for negotiations ✅    Contact us via Ticket on our Discord Server!
If you are interested in multiple orders, ask for a discount ✅
